inclusion.criterion: Placenta accreta managed either by cesarean hysterectomy or by uterine sparing
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Bladder injury was diagnosed and repaired during surgery 6 months ago
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of congenital urinary system anomalies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with stone bladder or tumour
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture and will require surgical intervention.
